entries.title_d: We have started some smaller attacks on parts of the Imperial Navy in the system. One of our Y-Wing squadrons has been hunted down after a successful mission and need your help in destroying the pursuing TIE fighters.
entries.title: Endor system: Assist Green Squadron in attacking the Empire.
entries.split_quest_alert: Rebel Fleet Command: < Great work out there pilot. One of our smugglers have brought equipment we need to repair our hyperdrive systems. He needs a escort. >
entries.quest_location_d: The Endor system is now starting to look like a war zone. We have more reinforcements coming from the Lok system and more and more Imperial reinforcements are pouring in ahead of their main fleet.
entries.quest_helpallies_d: The heavy Y-Wings are having trouble with the nimbler TIE fighters and will need your help in defeating them or perish.
entries.quest_findbattle_d: The Green Squadron leader has given you these coordinates as the point where they will try to fight back the pursuing TIE fighters.
entries.found_loc: Proceed to these coordinates, We will rendez-vous with you there.
entries.enemies_win: Can't keep my ship together, I'm falling ap..
entries.enemies_remain: Green Squadron Leader: < Hang in there everyone! Only %DI left! >
entries.enemies_arrived: Alright, the fools have arrived, get ready.
entries.battle_started: Time to fry some Imperial scum, bring it to them guys!
entries.allies_win: That's how it's done! Great job guys!
entries.allies_remain: Tactical Computer: < Sensors indicate termination of ally squad member. %DI allied ship remain in vicinity. >
entries.allies_arrived: Good to see you pilot. We've taken a beating so your presence is gladly accepted.
